results.title: Dynamic switch of immunity and antitumor effects of metformin in rat spontaneous esophageal carcinogenesis
results.text_hl: We also investigated the anticancer effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. To stimulate @DISEASE_Esophageal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D004938 @@@EC carcinogenesis@@@, chronic gastroduodenal @<m>DISEASE_Gastroesophageal_Reflux</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005764 @@@reflux esophagitis@@@ via esophagojejunostomy was induced in 120 @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ in @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated and non-treated (control) groups.

citations.NLM: Takei R, Miyashita T, Takada S, Tajima H, Ninomiya I, Takamura H, Fushida S, Harashima A, Munesue S, Yagi S, Inaki N, Ohta T, Yamamoto Y. Dynamic switch of immunity and antitumor effects of metformin in rat spontaneous esophageal carcinogenesis Cancer Immunol Immunother. 2022 Apr;71(4):777-789. PMID: 34398301

results.title: Evaluation of Vitamin B12 Monitoring in Patients on Concomitant Metformin and Proton Pump Inhibitors
results.text_hl: The risk of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ induced @DISEASE_Vitamin_B_12_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014806 @@@B12 deficiency@@@ increases with dose and duration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Chappell L, Brown SA, Wensel TM. Evaluation of Vitamin B12 Monitoring in Patients on Concomitant Metformin and Proton Pump Inhibitors Innov Pharm. 2020;11(4):. PMID: 34007643
